pages.name: Well Of Suffering
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.

(Altar) The area that the ritual searches for a $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$() to deposit its Blood into. $(br2)$(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 10 $(li)Vertical Radius: 15

(Damage) All mobs within this area will take damage every second or so until they die. This does not include players, fortunately. $(br2)Mobs will drop $(item)Items$(), so be sure to set up something to clean up the mess. $(br2)$(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 15 $(li)Vertical Radius: 15
Mobs will still drop non-Player Kill mob drops.
